title: Bloody Conflict at Osgiliath: Four Armies Divided - Third Age Total War Mod Gameplay
description:
There is a great divide in Middle earth.  Four armies march to Osgiliath to settle their feud, but only one will be left standing.  High Elves, Rhun, Harad, and the Kingdoms of Arnor ready their men for a bloody conflict.  Since this is a no rules Free For All there will be backstabbing, and last minute alliances.  Enjoy the battle :D

Third Age: Reforged is a Sub Mod for Third Age Total War, which is a mod for Medieval 2 Total War.
Mod Link: http://www.moddb.com/mods/third-age-reforged

Reforged Discord Link: https://discordapp.com/invite/rnNXfDd  

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
